synopsis.text: Yuu Matsuura and Miki Koishikawa are high school students leading ordinary lives, until an unexpected twist disrupts their normalcy. After their parents return from a Hawaiian getaway, they announce a shocking decision: a divorce, followed by a partner swap with another couple they met on vacation. As both families merge into one unconventional household, Miki and Yuu grapple with their new living situation. Amidst the chaos, they find solace in each other, gradually developing romantic feelings. However, maintaining their relationship proves challenging, as external admirers conspire to keep them apart. In this entangled web of love and family complexities, Miki and Yuu must navigate their feelings while dealing with the judgment of those around them.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
